text: 66|12|imeulan-ui ttal maliado machangajini, geunyeoga jasin-ui sungyeol-eul jikyeossgie naneun naega changjohan yeonghon(gabeuliel cheonsa)eulobuteo geu an-e sum-eul bul-eossnola. geunyeoneun jasin-ui junim-ui malsseumgwa geubun-ui seongseodeul-eul mid-eoss-eumyeo budanhi bogjonghaneun jadeul jung-ui hanayeossnola
